question: I'm using Local SGD with a decaying learning rate for distributed training. Which paper offers guidance on setting the synchronization period in Local SGD to optimize test accuracy?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: I'm using Local SGD with a decaying learning rate for distributed training. Which paper offers guidance on setting the synchronization period in Local SGD to optimize test accuracy?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: A QUADRATIC SYNCHRONIZATION RULE FOR DISTRIBUTED DEEP LEARNING
